name: signoz
description: SigNoz is an open-source observability platform for metrics, logs, and traces, built as a self-hosted alternative to Datadog and New Relic. It supports OpenTelemetry, dashboards, and alerting.

features.title: Distributed Tracing
features.description: Visualizes request flows across microservices with trace timelines

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Collects and displays application and infrastructure metrics in dashboards

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Aggregates logs from multiple sources with search and filtering

features.title: Opentelemetry Native
features.description: Built on OpenTelemetry for vendor-neutral instrumentation

features.title: Custom Dashboards
features.description: Creates visualizations with charts, graphs, and tables for metrics

features.title: Alert Rules
features.description: Configures alerts based on metrics, traces, or log patterns

features.title: Service Maps
features.description: Automatically generates topology maps showing service dependencies

features.title: Query Builder
features.description: Builds complex queries with visual interface or PromQL-like syntax
